All relevant info are already specified, if you think something relevant is missing I'd be happy to provide the extra info.
Have I written custom code: Yes and I put it up.
OS Platform and Distribution: I already specified, Ubuntu 16.04
TensorFlow installed from: pip install --upgrade tensorflow-gpu
TensorFlow version: 1.11.0
Bazel version: N/A
CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0 / 7.3
GPU model and memory: geforce gtx 1080 ti
Exact command to reproduce: python test-jacobian-simple.py -a elu
Mobile device: Laptop or computer
